description:
Designed in collaboration with Enduro World Series professionals, the SM Enduro Comp Saddle offers unbeatable comfort and freedom of movement. Its narrow seat and padded edges provide superior trail feedback, taking your riding skills to the next level. Conquer every line with precision and style.

  • Ergonomic design reduces pressure on sensitive areas and is the result of extensive testing, prototyping and science (X-rays and CT scans)
  • Narrow Y-shaped cutout providing extra pedaling room
  • OrthoCell® foam is specifically designed for supporting joints, making it durable and comfortable for long rides
  • Flat top allows you to change your seating position quickly and easily
  • The entire outer parameter is padded for maximum comfort
  • Designed for sit bones that are 12-16cm apart
  • Maximum load 120kg (265lbs)
name: Ergon SM Enduro Comp Saddle - Unisex
